department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Jesus of Nazareth and the Gospels
course.meeting_text: Th., 2-4, and hour to be arranged.
course.description: An investigation of the Gospels of the New Testament (Matthew, Mark, Luke, John) and other ancient Christian Gospel literature (Gospel of Thomas, Dialogue of the Savior); discussion of the developments from the oral traditions about Jesus to their written fixation and of the theological and communal concerns that influenced this process. Discussion of the question of the "historical Jesus."
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 1500.
